sdkWeb.title: Web API
sdkWeb.subtitle: Make HTTP requests to external APIs.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: The Web API allows your extension to make HTTP requests to external APIs and open URLs in the user's browser.
overview.warning: All URLs must be declared in your manifest permissions. Requests to undeclared URLs will fail.

fetch.title: Making Requests
fetch.intro: The fetchAsync method provides full control over HTTP requests:

convenienceMethods.title: Convenience Methods
convenienceMethods.intro: These methods simplify common fetch patterns:

permissions.intro: All URLs must be declared in your manifest. Check permissions before making requests:
